transcript: agent: Thank you for calling ProCircular Incident Response hotline. This is your AI assistant. I'm here to help you report a cybersecurity incident. Can you please tell me your name? user: Yes, my name is Jim Sherlock. agent: Thank you, Jim. And what company are you calling from? user: Cyberpave. agent: Thank you. Can you please describe the incident you're experiencing? user: All of my machines are locked up with malware. It says I need to pay Bitcoin. Everything is locked up internally and external system, including our payroll system. agent: I understand. That sounds like a ransomware attack. Do you have Cyber Liability Insurance? user: Yes, we do. agent: Great. Can you tell me the name of your insurance provider? user: Cowbell Cyber. agent: Thank you. And do you currently have an active Incident Response contract with ProCircular? user: Yes, we do. agent: Perfect. I have all the information I need. Our Incident Response Team will be notified immediately and will contact you shortly at the phone number you're calling from. Is there anything else you'd like to add? user: No, that's all. agent: Okay. Thank you for calling ProCircular. Our team will be in touch very soon. user: Okay. Thank you. agent: You're welcome. Goodbye.
summary: The user, Jim Sherlock from Cyberpave, reported a malware incident where all machines, including the payroll system, are locked up and a Bitcoin payment is demanded. He confirmed having Cyber Liability Insurance with Cowbell Cyber and an active IR contract with ProCircular.

analysis.IR_call_description: All of my machines are locked up with malware. It says I need to pay Bitcoin. Everything is locked up internally and external system, including our payroll system.
